question: The local school would like residents in the area to help maintain the school buildings and the grounds. Write to the school principal. In your letter, say why you want to help explain what help you can offer state when you are available
text: I am writing to offer my help with maintaining the school buildings and the play area. It saddens me that the school's current budget is insufficient to cover such work. But as a parent, I agree that your plan to enlist the help of local residents is a good short-term solution.

As a local contractor, I am sure that I can help with various aspects of building maintenance and have the skills and tools to handle most jobs. I also live nearby and would be happy to lend a hand whenever needed.
I have many years of experience in construction and can help with keeping the buildings and grounds in good condition. I am also available on weekday mornings from 9 am to 12 pm.
Please let me know more details about what needs doing.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
